english.segment1: Time. It's eating me alive. Unable to rewind. Sink deeper while I'm climbing. Never to arrive
english.segment2: I gave you everything. But still you need to feed. And underneath it all I'm screaming out
english.segment3: Just carry on. Just prove me wrong. I know that I'm dying right now. And it seems that I'm so far gone. But not for long. I'll just be strong and keep knowing. That now I will overtake you
english.segment4: Just one that you can use. One risk but you can't lose. Play the victim while abusing. Anyone you choose
english.segment5: Painful consequence. Of standing on your lies. I'm barely breathing but. I'm screaming out
english.segment6: Just carry on. Just prove me wrong. I know that I'm dying right now. And it seems that I'm so far gone. But not for long. I'll just be strong and keep knowing. That now I will overtake you
english.segment7: I know that I'm dying right now. And it seems that I'm so far gone. (Overtake you). I'll just be strong and keep knowing. That now I will overtake
english.segment8: You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead. You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead. You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead. You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead
english.segment9: Just carry on. Just prove me wrong. I know that I'm dying right now. And it seems that I'm so far gone. But not for long. I'll just be strong and keep knowing. That now I will overtake you
english.segment10: You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead. You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead. (Overtake you). You'll come to get me, but. You'll end up dead. (Overtake you, overtake you). You'll come to get me. (Overtake you). You'll come to get me
